name: Cooperdus
description:
A small coop puzzle game done during a jam (but not submitted to it).

I was part of the organizing team of Unijam 2022, and one of the pitched ideas I loved was abandonned, so I decided to try some stuff around the idea while learning new stuff in Godot.
You can find the source code on framagit.

--- Controls : ---
WASD (physical location) or first gamepad directional buttons to move character 1
Keyboard arrows or second gamepad directional buttons to move character 2

R or any gamepad L/R to restart
M or any gamepas select to play/pause music

Initial pitch by Akasuna.
